scripts.lighthouse: npm run lighthouse:dark:desktop && npm run lighthouse:dark:mobile && npm run lighthouse:light:desktop && npm run lighthouse:light:mobile
scripts.lighthouse:parallel: npm run build && concurrently -n dark-desktop,dark-mobile,light-desktop,light-mobile "npm run lighthouse:dark:desktop:nobuild" "npm run lighthouse:dark:mobile:nobuild" "npm run lighthouse:light:desktop:nobuild" "npm run lighthouse:light:mobile:nobuild"
scripts.lighthouse:dark: npm run lighthouse:dark:desktop && npm run lighthouse:dark:mobile
scripts.lighthouse:light: npm run lighthouse:light:desktop && npm run lighthouse:light:mobile
scripts.lighthouse:desktop: npm run lighthouse:dark:desktop && npm run lighthouse:light:desktop
scripts.lighthouse:mobile: npm run lighthouse:dark:mobile && npm run lighthouse:light:mobile
scripts.lighthouse:dark:desktop: npm run build && npm run lighthouse:dark:desktop:nobuild
scripts.lighthouse:dark:desktop:nobuild: COLOR_SCHEME=dark lhci collect --config=lighthouserc.dark.desktop.cjs && lhci assert --config=lighthouserc.dark.desktop.cjs && lhci upload --config=lighthouserc.dark.desktop.cjs
scripts.lighthouse:dark:mobile: npm run build && npm run lighthouse:dark:mobile:nobuild
scripts.lighthouse:dark:mobile:nobuild: COLOR_SCHEME=dark lhci collect --config=lighthouserc.dark.mobile.cjs && lhci assert --config=lighthouserc.dark.mobile.cjs && lhci upload --config=lighthouserc.dark.mobile.cjs
scripts.lighthouse:light:desktop: npm run build && npm run lighthouse:light:desktop:nobuild
scripts.lighthouse:light:desktop:nobuild: COLOR_SCHEME=light lhci collect --config=lighthouserc.light.desktop.cjs && lhci assert --config=lighthouserc.light.desktop.cjs && lhci upload --config=lighthouserc.light.desktop.cjs
scripts.lighthouse:light:mobile: npm run build && npm run lighthouse:light:mobile:nobuild
scripts.lighthouse:light:mobile:nobuild: COLOR_SCHEME=light lhci collect --config=lighthouserc.light.mobile.cjs && lhci assert --config=lighthouserc.light.mobile.cjs && lhci upload --config=lighthouserc.light.mobile.cjs
